MachineSelection.PleaseSelectMachineArray: Please select the printer model you want to connect
MachineSelection.LoadFirmwareTipsArray:
Visit 
 https://www.creality.com/pages/download—> Ecosystem —> Creality Nebula Smart Kit 
 to download the 3D printer firmware for connecting with the Nebula Pad. Copy it to the root directory of the memory card and insert it into the printer for burning
MachineSelection.SkipSelectMachineArray: 2. If you have already flashed the firmware, please skip it.

ErrorMsgs.Key2524Content: Leveling sensor chip abnormality, sensor damage or environmental impact.

ErrorMsgs.Key2535Content: Residue on the hotbed, please clean it

ErrorMsgs.Key2561Content: Spray head motherboard communication error, please scan the QR code or contact cs@creality.com for a solution.
ErrorMsgs.Key2562Content: Communication error with heated bed MCU
